title: dark cosmic jhin....
body:
is probably one of the best skins in the game. his dance and ult visuals are the biggest selling points for me.

10/10 will buy bundle on the first day.

and he even expands the skin universe in his VO
apparently dark star are imperfect corruptions of cosmic, jhin is what a perfect corruption would be. aurelion sol exist in their universe but as an elder.

elder cosmic aurelion sol skin please.
